name: TLS Client Certificate Validation
summary: Validate certificates provided by the client during TLS handshake (HTTPS).
description: Validate client certificates against individual certificates and CA certificates.

pem_certificate.title: PEM formatted certificate
pem_certificate.description: Certificate including the -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE----- and -----END CERTIFICATE-----

whitelist.title: Certificate Whitelist
whitelist.description: Individual certificates and CA certificates to be whitelisted.

allow_partial_chain.description: Allow certificate verification with only an intermediate certificate

oneOf.title: Enables OCSP validation of the client certificate.
Use certificates revocation list (CRL) in the PEM format to verify client certificates.
Do not check for certificate recovation status

revoke_list.title: Certificate RevokeList
revoke_list.description: Individual certificates and CA certificates to be revoked.

ocsp_responder_url.title: OCSP Responder URL
ocsp_responder_url.description: Overrides the URL of the OCSP responder specified in the “Authority Information Access” certificate extension for validation of client certificates.

cache_ttl.title: Max TTL for cached OCSP response
